message.body: Did you leave yet? Why do I always miss you!
Did I really miss you?! Noooo! It's because of the spotty/shitty reception in my house. If I sit on the couch I lose signal and I don't hear my phone ring.
Alrighty darling. Time for work. I love you so so much. Have a good night!
I love you too! Still working on my microbio. Feel like I'm going to be here for a while!
No no no. Dont do that, baby. That sounds yucky. Finish up quickly and relax!
I know. My sister wasn't in the mood for helping me so I'm kinda on my own. But it's okay. I don't know what I'm doing and frankly, I don't give a damn!
Woah!! My beau's feelin a little rebellious tonight! Dang haha. Then definitely get it out of the way haha. No need to mess up an evening with hw
I already had a breakdown doing this. I don't know how to make the graphs and my sister kept saying I don't know so I broke down.
Oh darling no no. Dont worry. Youre doing really well in both classes. Dont let it trip you up. You got this. Dont worry about any silly graphs
Oh but I am! I can't get the graph to look right with the right axis and it's driving me insane.
:-/ can you leave it for now?
Due tomorrow.
Gah ok, my love. Good luck!

I gave up. I got the graphs and I think those are okay but I don't think it's any good. I wound up emailing my lab partner to see if he knows how to fill out a table. If he doesn't, then I'm going to ask adam for help after lab and then send it to him afterwards.
Thatll work. It'll be fine. Its late and youve got a big day tomorrow. Time for some sleeps

Yes. Omg. I've never been so worked up over a lab assignment before. I think it was because I completely forgot about it and instead of being able to ask crystal all weekend, I was only about to ask her for like an hour and she didn't want to help me and excel kept shutting down, not saving my graphs! Ugh. It was an awful night!
I'm just glad it was Adam's class and not my chem class. Otherwise I'd be afraid to ask for help on the day it's due! But finally time for sleep!!! I love you baby! You be safe getting home!
Its over, my love. Sorry it was so crappy. But youre done! I love you so so much. Sleep well, darling
Thanks baby! You sleep too eventually...when you get home.
Ha will do. Cant wait. Im in a super shit mood being here...i wanna go home
I know baby. I want you to come home too. Just think of this 3 more months on this and then you graduate!!!!
Well, 4 but that's still okay!
Mmmmhm. Tis the dream :)
:D living it with you!! Okie, going to bed. I love you baby!!
Sweetest dreams, my love :)
Getting into the car. Sorry. Can I call ya later?
Yes of course!
